item.title: B/B+ Trees How they are helpful in Database?
item.description: What are those? Ever used trees while searching through the dataset. How B trees are useful in databases? To understand stuff more clearly let’s take a scenario: – Like we have a table, a huge table(millions of rows to go through), and we want to search to a particular numbered row by some id mentioned “100035” and not only pulling a row but getting most out of the pulled row.
